name: Tech Innovation Club
description: A community of tech enthusiasts passionate about innovation, coding, and emerging technologies. We organize hackathons, workshops, and tech talks.

name: Cultural Arts Society
description: Celebrating diversity through art, music, dance, and cultural events. We bring together students from different backgrounds to share their heritage.

name: Environmental Action Group
description: Dedicated to environmental conservation and sustainability. We organize clean-up drives, awareness campaigns, and eco-friendly initiatives.

name: Business & Entrepreneurship Club
description: Fostering entrepreneurial mindset and business acumen. We host startup competitions, business plan workshops, and networking events.

name: Sports & Recreation Committee
description: Promoting physical fitness and sportsmanship through various athletic events, tournaments, and recreational activities.

name: Photography Club
description: Capturing moments and telling stories through the lens. We organize photo walks, exhibitions, and photography workshops.

name: Debate & Public Speaking Society
description: Enhancing communication skills and critical thinking through debates, public speaking events, and oratory competitions.

name: Music & Performing Arts
description: A platform for musicians, singers, and performers to showcase their talent and collaborate on creative projects.
